ch.epfl.lis.wingj

Class WJMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.WJMessage

  • public class WJMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Shows a message in a single JDialog. Supported types are INFO, WARNING, and ERROR.
    Version:
    May 31, 2012
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com), Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ERROR_PREFIX
      Prefix that an exception message should contain to be considered as ERROR.
      static java.lang.String INFO_PREFIX
      Prefix that an exception message should contain to be considered as INFO.
      static java.lang.String WARNING_PREFIX
      Prefix that an exception message should contain to be considered as WARNING.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void showMessage(java.lang.Error e)
      Shows message (type depends on the message prefix).
      static void showMessage(java.lang.Exception e)

      static void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Shows message (type is INFO).
      static void showMessage(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String type)
      Shows message with given type.
